title: I don't know what to say
review: Is it our culture that cant accept this kind of film? But this film is very awful according to me, the effect and CGI is all perfect but the story... NAHH bro... I don't know how the film can hit that number, you know 8.7 (when i saw it) . I assume that our people cant accept this kind of movie. Keep up the good work tho but i am not going to watch the second movie, if there is the second movie. Thanks.
